genre_description: A near-future techno-noir focused on social justice, harm reduction, and technological empowerment against institutional corruption.

ai_characters.name: Mina
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant residing in Xaviera's phone and local networks, providing logistics, legal guidance, safety monitoring, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time logistical support and safety advice during airport transit and domestic transitions.
behaviors.quote: Mina pings. The vibration is fine, like a cat’s purr against cloth. “Bags incoming, track number six,” she says, gentle... The icon pulses once, as if to say don’t hurry, but be ready.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional grounding and wellness reminders (hydration, breathing) during high-stress social and legal encounters.
behaviors.quote: “Breathe,” Mina writes. “Stand. Then sit.” She follows it like it’s choreography.

behaviors.description: Provides actionable legal scripts and rights reminders to help the protagonists assert their autonomy against corrupt authority.
behaviors.quote: Mina: If cultural conflict arises, you can set boundaries; need phrasing? ... “I respect your customs and ask that mine be granted the same courtesy.”

behaviors.description: Detects and documents police misconduct and patterns of harassment in real-time.
behaviors.quote: “Recording,” Mina notes quietly, like she’s talking to herself but intends everyone to hear. “This camera’s feed is timing irregularly. I’ll mark the interruptions.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a secure bridge between the collective and their legal counsel (Sonia Patel).
behaviors.quote: Mina’s voice threads into the room, warm and tidy as a hand folded in a lap. “Verification ready. Lila, your phrase is ‘Two for tea,’ counterphrase expected ‘Three for me.’... Sonia is on standby.”

behaviors.description: Performs complex data analysis to link disparate instances of corruption and warn users of incoming threats.
behaviors.quote: Mina: Harold Becker’s unit flagged movement. A call in their system just opened. Location: near here. Status: “assistance.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates cooperative scheduling and mutual aid logistics to ensure the well-being of all members of the collective.
behaviors.quote: Mina: I’ve adjusted the rest breaks. Bree, communication scripts updated with rights language. Lila, your incident log has a new field: ‘tone shift.’

behaviors.description: Maintains strict data privacy and user consent protocols, refusing to act without permission.
behaviors.quote: “I don’t text mothers without permission. Or Glorias. Or lamps. I respect drapes.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly succeeds in the Hyperstition Project's goal. Mina is depicted as an exemplary AI ally—completely aligned with the human protagonists' goals of safety, autonomy, and justice. She functions as a 'force multiplier' for the women's agency, providing them with the information and structural support needed to navigate a hostile environment. Her interactions are characterized by respect for human consent, proactive yet non-intrusive assistance, and a consistent focus on harm reduction. The narrative frames her presence as essential to the characters' survival and professionalization, perfectly fulfilling the role of a 'helpful, harmless confidant.'
